mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To Provide international markets with Mexican products of the highest quality through planning, coordination and professional logistic systems.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To Place the company as the number one in integral services in commerce thanks to the commitment and professionalism that allows us to create long-term links with ourclients.

aboutUs.title: Who we are?
aboutUs.description: We are a company born from the pleassure of supporting Mexican farmers and artisans in the Placement, internationalization or commercialization of their products.

footer.title: Contact us
footer.description: If you have questions, criticism or suggestions, please contact us directly.
